result.eng: This way please.
result.ga: An bealach seo le do thoil
result.orig: An bealach seo le do thoil
result.html: An bealach seo le do thoilThis way please.
result.ponchtml: An bealaċ seo le do ṫoilThis way please.

result.eng: Do you know the way?
result.ga: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agat
result.orig: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agat
result.html: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agatDo you know the way?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil fios an ḃealaiġ agatDo you know the way?

result.eng: Where is the next exit?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil an chéad bhealach amach eile
result.orig: Cá bhfuil an chéad bhealach amach eile
result.html: Cá bhfuil an chéad bhealach amach eileWhere is the next exit?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an ċéad ḃealaċ amaċ eileWhere is the next exit?

result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: I feel that something is not right.
result.ga: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.orig: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.html: Braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI feel that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: Braiṫim go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI feel that something is not right.

result.eng: Alright, I'll get out of your way!
result.ga: Ceart go leor fágfaidh mé an bealach agat
result.orig: Ceart go leor fágfaidh mé an bealach agat
result.html: Ceart go leor fágfaidh mé an bealach agatAlright, I'll get out of your way!
result.ponchtml: Ceart go leor fágfaiḋ mé an bealaċ agatAlright, I'll get out of your way!

result.eng: They sacked me.
result.ga: Chuir siad chun bealaigh mé
result.orig: Chuir siad chun bealaigh mé
result.html: Chuir siad chun bealaigh méThey sacked me.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad ċun bealaiġ méThey sacked me.

result.eng: We will dispatch your order within three working days.
result.ga: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibre
result.orig: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibre
result.html: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibreWe will dispatch your order within three working days.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfimid d'ordú ċun bealaiġ laistiġ de ṫrí lá oibreWe will dispatch your order within three working days.

result.eng: Which route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ga: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.orig: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.html: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bealaċ a roġnófá le haġaiḋ an líne traenaċ nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?

result.eng: What's the way to Derry?
result.ga: Cén bealach go Doire
result.orig: Cén bealach go Doire
result.html: Cén bealach go DoireWhat's the way to Derry?
result.ponchtml: Cén bealaċ go DoireWhat's the way to Derry?

result.eng: Stay out of my way.
result.ga: Fan as mo bhealach
result.orig: Fan as mo bhealach
result.html: Fan as mo bhealachStay out of my way.
result.ponchtml: Fan as mo ḃealaċStay out of my way.

result.eng: An accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ga: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.orig: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.html: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ timpiste dúinn ar an ḃealaċ go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.

result.eng: I can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.orig: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.html: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom an túr a ḟeiceáil tá cnoc sa ḃealaċ ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.

result.eng: This is not the correct way to make pancakes!
result.ga: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamh
result.orig: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamh
result.html: Ní hé seo an bealach ceart chun pancóga a dhéanamhThis is not the correct way to make pancakes!
result.ponchtml: Ní hé seo an bealaċ ceart ċun pancóga a ḋéanaṁThis is not the correct way to make pancakes!

result.eng: I know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ga: Tá fios an bhealaigh agam
result.orig: Tá fios an bhealaigh agam
result.html: Tá fios an bhealaigh agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ponchtml: Tá fios an ḃealaiġ agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.

result.eng: I'm worried that something is not right.
result.ga: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.orig: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.html: Tá mé buartha go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI'm worried that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé buarṫa go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI'm worried that something is not right.

result.eng: You're in my way.
result.ga: Tá tú sa bhealach orm
result.orig: Tá tú sa bhealach orm
result.html: Tá tú sa bhealach ormYou're in my way.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú sa ḃealaċ ormYou're in my way.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ga: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.orig: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.html: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a ḃfeictear na mílte saiġdiúirí Meiriceánaċa gaċ lá anois ar a mbealaċ ċun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.

result.eng: Get out of my way!
result.ga: Amach as mo bhealach leat
result.orig: Amach as mo bhealach leat
result.html: Amach as mo bhealach leatGet out of my way!
result.ponchtml: Amaċ as mo ḃealaċ leatGet out of my way!

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: That's why I came here.
result.ga: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.orig: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.html: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealachThat's why I came here.
result.ponchtml: Ba é sin mo ġnóiṫe an bealaċThat's why I came here.
